login.label: Arizen: 로그인
login.dataImportFailed: 데이터를 가져오는 데 실패하였습니다. 잘못된 자격증명일 수 있습니다.
login.walletReplaceMsg: 당신의 실제 지갑을 대체하게 됩니다.. 확실하십니까?

importExportPks.InvalidLinePk: ${0} 행에 잘못된 개인 키 값이 있습니다.
importExportPks.InvalidPk: 개인 비공개 키 파일의 ${0} 행에 잘못된 개인 키 값 있습니다.

tabDeposit.label: 예금
tabDeposit.help: 예금을 바라는 주소의 오른쪽에 초록색 버튼을 클릭해주세요

messages.unknownToAddr: 받는 사람의 주소가 이 지갑에서 지원하지 않는 주소입니다.

tabWithdraw.label: 출금하기
tabWithdraw.help: 출금을 바라는 주소의 오른쪽에 빨간색 버튼을 클릭해주세요.

messages.unknownFromAddr: 보내는 사람의 주소가 이 지갑에서 지원하지 않는 주소입니다.
messages.insufficientFirstSource: 1번째 소스에서 불충분한 금액이 있습니다. (최소금액: 한도액 + 수수료)!
messages.insufficientNextSource: 2번째 소스나 그 이후의 소스에서 불충분한 금액이 있습니다. (최소금액: 한도액)!
messages.sumLowerThanFee: 모든 소스 주소의 합계 잔액이 수수료보다 낮습니다.
messages.zenApi: Zen API 가 설정되어 있지 않습니다!
messages.toAddressBadPrefix: 보낼 주소의 시작문자는 ‘zn’이어야 합니다. 잘못된 주소입니다!
messages.isCoinbaseUTXO: Your address contains newly mined coins, also called coinbase unspent transaction outputs (coinbase UTXO). These need to be shielded and unshielded first before they can be spent, please import the private key of this address into a full wallet like Swing and then send all your coins from this address to a Z-address and then back to this T-address. You will be then able to spend them in Arizen as well.

settings.label: 설정
settings.autoLogOffTimeout: Auto log off timeout in seconds

importSinglePrivateKey.warningNotValidPK: This is not a valid Private Key or you try to import a Spending Key (only for Z addresses) as T address Private key.

changePassword.title: Change Wallet Password
changePassword.warningText: WARNING: Wallet backups won't be re-encrypted! If you need to use them, you will have to use current password.

menu.importUnencrypted: 암호화 되지 않은 Arizen 지갑 가져오기

warmingMessages.userWarningImportFileWithPKs: New address(es) and a private key(s) will be imported. Your previous back-ups do not include the newly imported addresses or the corresponding private keys. Please use the backup feature of Arizen to make new backup file and replace your existing Arizen wallet backup. By pressing 'I understand' you declare that you understand this. For further information please refer to the help menu of Arizen.
warmingMessages.userWarningExportWalletUnencrypted: You are going to export an UNENCRYPTED wallet ( ie your private keys) in plain text. That means that anyone with this file can control your ZENs. Store this file in a safe place. By pressing 'I understand' you declare that you understand this. For further information please refer to the help menu of Arizen.
warmingMessages.userWarningExportWalletEncrypted: You are going to export an ENCRYPTED wallet and your private keys will be encrypted. That means that in order to access your private keys you need to know the corresponding wallet name and password. In case you don't know them you cannot control the ZENs that are controled by these private keys. By pressing 'I understand' you declare that you understand this. For further information please refer to the help menu of Arizen.
warmingMessages.userWarningImportPK: A new address and a private key will be imported. Your previous back-ups do not include the newly imported address or the corresponding private key. Please use the backup feature of Arizen to make new backup file and replace your existing Arizen wallet backup. By pressing 'I understand' you declare that you understand this. For further information please refer to the help menu of Arizen.
warmingMessages.userWarningCreateNewAddress: A new address and a private key will be created. Your previous back-ups do not include this newly generated address or the corresponding private key. Please use the backup feature of Arizen to make new backup file and replace your existing Arizen wallet backup. By pressing 'I understand' you declare that you understand this. For further information please refer to the help menu of Arizen.
warmingMessages.userWarningImportPkUserZendRescan: The balance of the Z address you imported will be visible after you rescan the blockchain. Please run 'zen-cli stop && sleep 8 && zend -rescan' in your secure node (linux).
